title: Darkness: Poems of Extreme Horror
description: Enter a world filled with serial killers, cannibalism, unnatural love, creatures hiding in the dark and so much more! Filled with blood, gore and unforgiving horror. This aint your mom's poetry book! Once you start reading you may think you know what to expect. You will find that the further you go, the more the darkness spreads.
author: Eric Kapitan
